Dialogue.Page: Fret's Quest is one of the first story mod for Outer Wilds, sending players on a quest to find a magical banjo which was stolen from a Nomai named Fret.
The mod may seem like it's a bit of a joke, but it's much more than that. It has lore, surprises, characters, and was the first mod to do quite a few things.
What's certain is that Fret's Quest is a mod worth playing, and that it was a milestone for the Outer Wilds modding community.
